basics.name: Pham Nhat Quang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: As a dedicated B.S. Software Engineering student at the FPT University of Can Tho's Department of Information Technology, I am on track to graduate in Fall 2024. Throughout my academic journey, I have built a robust foundation in key IT areas, honing skills in software development, .NET framework, and mobile and web application development. My curriculum has been enriched with a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application, enabling me to tackle complex challenges in software engineering with confidence and creativity. My proactive approach to learning, combined with hands-on experience in diverse projects, positions me to make a significant impact in the rapidly evolving field of technology.

education.institution: FPT University of Can Tho, Vietnam

work.summary: Partake in mock projects simulating real working environment, and company's internal projects
highlights: Develop company website with WordPress and Elementor plugin
